title: Bad News, Equalitarians
author: VD
content_html:
It’s official. You’re anti-semitic.

As for me, I am opposed to equality in all its forms. And I will certainly enjoy informing the next virtue-signaling individual waxing on about how he doesn’t judge people by race, creed, or color that he is, officially, an anti-semite.

Let’s face it, for all its lunatic awfulness, sometimes Clown World can be amusing.

DISCUSS ON SG
content_text:
